Scripture.1 Nephi 1:1: I, Nephi, having been aborn of bgoodly cparents, therefore I was dtaught somewhat in all the learning of my father; and having seen many eafflictions in the course of my days, nevertheless, having been highly favored of the Lord in all my days; yea, having had a great knowledge of the goodness and the mysteries of God, therefore I make a frecord of my proceedings in my days.

Scripture.1 Nephi 1:2: Yea, I make a record in the alanguage of my father, which consists of the learning of the Jews and the language of the Egyptians.

Scripture.1 Nephi 1:3: And I know that the record which I make is atrue; and I make it with mine own hand; and I make it according to my knowledge.
